Package main

Class Item

java.lang.Object
main.Buyable
main.Item
public class Item extends Buyable
Represents an item and that can be purchased by the Player at the Market. Since items are less complex than Athletes, instead of generating separate instances of identical items, a single instance is created, and the quantities currently owned by the player and Market respectively are stored in fields. Items have various values that will modify various athlete statistics when used.
Version:
1.04
Author:
mdi48, bsm62

  • Constructor Details

    • Item

      public Item(String name, int stamina, int offence, int defence, int restoration, int price)
      Constructor that creates the window and adds graphical elements and buttons.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the Item
      stamina - the amount that an athletes' max stamina will increase by when used
      offence - the amount that an athletes' offence will increase by when used
      defence - the amount that an athletes' defence will increase by when used
      restoration - the amount of stamina that will be added to an athlete's current stamina when used
      price - the items' base price
